WRITING.TITLE: Is it too late to Invest in Ripple XRP?

WRITING.TEXT: The daily crypto volume is over 2 Bil. How much of this do you think is new capital into the system???

Is this the optimal choice in providing liquidity and to avoid translation exposure when making payments periodically? How can we avoid the 1% fee?
Coincidentally, I just did a video on TokenCard (and Token and Status.im) this weekend, take a look here (TokenCard is the third story). https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5Uq8anitOMw

Hey guys, this is my second video now, I am planning on expanding more into general bitcoin and altcoin news and fundamental and technical analysis. Looking forward to producing shows more often, and love suggestions from my peers. Thx /u/rezzme.

WRITING.TITLE: CryptoCoinShow - Ethereum All-Time High Price and Active Developments
Twitter Crypto Recap April 27 with Jesse Couch

WRITING.TEXT: You need to look at the supply of XRP compared to Bitcoin. Huge difference. Focus on the market cap doubling or tripling and see that target price. Also keep in mind that as transactions occur some ripple is destroyed, changing the supply.
I guess some just think that because its crypto we can cross lines without repercussions.
Can you link me to the slack? Couldn't find it by searching
